underlying_goal: Implement automatic terminal background color detection for the pdb++ configuration and document the new feature.
primary_success: After realizing the code from the plan was already implemented, Claude pivoted to verifying the implementation, documenting the new auto-detection feature in the README, and committing the changes.
brief_summary: The user provided a plan to add automatic terminal background detection to `pdbrc.py`. Claude found the implementation was already present in the file, so it proceeded to verify the functionality, add comprehensive documentation for the new feature to the README.md, and then committed and pushed the changes.
